publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3482 Maureen Watt: Congratulations to North Sea Rescuersâ€”That the Parliament remembers the significant dangers faced by everyone working offshore in the North Sea oil industry; recognises that the safety of those workers is always of paramount concern, and congratulates all those involved in the successful rescue of all passengers and crew from the stricken helicopter that ditched near the ETAP (Eastern Trough Area Project) platform on Wednesday 18 February 2009. Supported by: Angela Constance*, Jamie Hepburn*, Rob Gibson*, Des McNulty*, Sandra White*, Christopher Harvie*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, John Park*, Stewart Maxwell*, Alasdair Allan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Aileen Campbell*, Gil Paterson*, Nigel Don*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Brian Adam*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-3482 Congratulations to North Sea Rescuers (lodged on 19 February 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Christine Grahame*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Butler*, Patrick Harvie*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-3482 Congratulations to North Sea Rescuers (lodged on 19 February 2009) Christina McKelvie*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-3482 Congratulations to North Sea Rescuers (lodged on 19 February 2009) Hugh Henry*, David Stewart*
S3M-3482 Congratulations to North Sea Rescuers (lodged on 19 February 2009) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-3482 Congratulations to North Sea Rescuers (lodged on 19 February 2009) Dave Thompson*, Jack McConnell*
